title: Inside Liam Hemsworth’s ‘lovey dovey’ date with Maddison Brown
text:
Liam and Maddison have been spotted on dates

So it seems Liam Hemsworth is moving on from Miley Cyrus with Australian actress Maddison Brown.

After the fresh couple has been photographed holding hands and getting all kinds of close, it’s been claimed their recent dates are incredibly ‘lovey dovey’.

And isn’t that just lovely to hear.

The two were pictured last week heading out on a lunch date at Sant Ambroeus in the West Village of New York City.

While they seemed extremely close, according to HollywoodLife, the pair simply couldn’t resist the PDA as they enjoyed their meal.

Miley and Liam split in August (Picture: WireImage)

A source told the website: ‘He appeared to be a gentleman throughout. They were holding hands and he held her close while opening doors for her when they stepped outside to get to their table. They were in zero rush and were there for over an hour.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘He requested a table outside to enjoy the weather. No one recognised him or most of the other patrons played dumb because they weren’t bugging him or them at all.’

After hiding out in Byron Bay for weeks following his split from Miley in August, 29-year-old Liam was papped in the US with the 22-year-old actress, best known for playing Kirby Anders on the Dynasty reboot, and also had a role in Strangerland opposite Nicole Kidman.

Even though the pair weren’t making out – after all, he is a gentleman as aforementioned source said – there was no question the pair were into one another.

Miley is loved up with Cody Simpson (Picture: Instagram)

The source continued: ‘Never was there any time they were making out but they were in constant conversation.

‘There was no lull period between conversations or laughter, any time food or drink was delivered they were knee deep in conversation and very involved in each other and whatever they were talking about. They were definitely getting along. When they left he reached for her hand and she took it. They were having a really good time.’

The pair are said to be taking things slow with their ‘very new’ relationship, although a source told People magazine recently Liam is ‘definitely interested’ in the Dynasty actress.

Meanwhile, Miley is also in a new relationship with Aussie musician Cody Simpson. Prior to dating Cody, the singer was dating long-time friend Kaitlynn Carter just a month after her and Liam announced their split.

Liam seemed to be having a lot of fun with Maddison as they headed out following their lunch and flouted their previous rule of no PDA.

The happy couple were pictured enjoying a very handsy moment after an evening of drinks at The Flower Shop bar with pals, before Maddison was seen bending over backwards as Liam nuzzled into her neck.

Clutching his new potential-girlfriend on the hips, Liam then passionately kissed Maddison who wrapped her arms around his neck.

The two were seen with friends, and later Liam appeared to take things a step further when he picked up a traffic cone and tried to carry it on one shoulder.

Love, right?
